name: GraphProxy
description: Graph Proxy. Graph Proxy contract used to delegate call implementation contracts and support upgrades. This contract should NOT define storage as it is managed by GraphProxyStorage. This contract implements a proxy that is upgradeable by an admin. https://docs.openzeppelin.com/upgrades-plugins/1.x/proxies#transparent-proxies-and-function-clashes.

parameterDecorators.name: reporter
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the entity that reported the updater misbehavior.

parameterDecorators.name: reporter
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the entity that reported the updater misbehavior.

parameterDecorators.name: reporter
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the entity that reported the updater misbehavior.

functionDecorators.name: acceptUpgrade
functionDecorators.description: Admin function for new implementation to accept its role as implementation.

functionDecorators.name: acceptUpgradeAndCall
functionDecorators.description: Admin function for new implementation to accept its role as implementation.

functionDecorators.name: admin
functionDecorators.description: Returns the current admin. NOTE: Only the admin and implementation can call this function. TIP: To get this value clients can read directly from the storage slot shown below (specified by EIP1967) using the https://eth.wiki/json-rpc/API#eth_getstorageat[`eth_getStorageAt`] RPC call. `0xb53127684a568b3173ae13b9f8a6016e243e63b6e8ee1178d6a717850b5d6103`.

functionDecorators.name: implementation
functionDecorators.description: Returns the current implementation. NOTE: Only the admin can call this function. TIP: To get this value clients can read directly from the storage slot shown below (specified by EIP1967) using the https://eth.wiki/json-rpc/API#eth_getstorageat[`eth_getStorageAt`] RPC call. `0x360894a13ba1a3210667c828492db98dca3e2076cc3735a920a3ca505d382bbc`.

functionDecorators.name: pendingImplementation
functionDecorators.description: Returns the current pending implementation. NOTE: Only the admin can call this function. TIP: To get this value clients can read directly from the storage slot shown below (specified by EIP1967) using the https://eth.wiki/json-rpc/API#eth_getstorageat[`eth_getStorageAt`] RPC call. `0x9e5eddc59e0b171f57125ab86bee043d9128098c3a6b9adb4f2e86333c2f6f8c`.

functionDecorators.name: setAdmin
functionDecorators.description: Changes the admin of the proxy. NOTE: Only the admin can call this function.

functionDecorators.name: upgradeTo
functionDecorators.description: Upgrades to a new implementation contract.

parameterDecorators.name: _newImplementation
parameterDecorators.description: Address of implementation contract NOTE: Only the admin can call this function.
